originalText.text: Elizabeth is great, very attentive and professional. I started seeing the results in just 3 sessions!

text.text: Elizabeth is great, very attentive and professional. I started seeing the results in just 3 sessions!

originalText.text:
I have been going to Elizabeth for over two years now. Simply put, she is amazing. From my first visit to every subsequent session, she has always paid close detail to what my goals and needs are. I had her work on my sideburns, upper lip, and brows. She is very meticulous and works in an orderly and organized way. She keeps track of what side she has worked on each session and creates a plan of what she is going to do. She made me feel very comfortable about what we were going to do. I had not tried electrolysis before this so she was very detailed in explaining the process and what to expect.

I enjoy all my sessions with Elizabeth. On top of her incredible work ethic, she has an amazing personality - she is friendly, warm, personable, and a kind person.  She really gets to know you as a client and makes you feel taken care of, comfortable, and beautiful!

I highly recommend Elizabeth!

originalText.text: Elizabeth is wonderful. She is patient and very informative. You never feel rushed and she is precise. She is always booked up, and I can tell why! 5 stars all the way!

text.text: Elizabeth is wonderful. She is patient and very informative. You never feel rushed and she is precise. She is always booked up, and I can tell why! 5 stars all the way!

originalText.text: I've been a client of Elizabeth for close to 20 years.  She is excellent at her work and she always knows the answer to any skin or body hair question.  She's a smart and kind person with great energy and she knows exactly what she's doing.  Her electrolysis treatments work - the hair does not come back.

originalText.text: A delightful and professional person.  Clean facility.  Always punctual.  Pleasant.  Clear communicator about what to expect and what it will cost.  Highly recommend.
